00026 #ifndef __AnimationSet_H__

00033 
00034 namespace Ogre {
00035 
00043     class _OgreExport AnimationState : public ControllerValue
00044     {
00045     public:
00047         AnimationState();
00048         
00050         AnimationState(const String& animName, Real timePos, Real length, Real weight = 1.0, bool enabled = false);
00052         String getAnimationName() const;
00054         void setAnimationName(const String& name);
00056         Real getTimePosition(void) const;
00058         void setTimePosition(Real timePos);
00060         Real getLength() const;
00062         void setLength(Real len);
00064         Real getWeight(void) const;
00066         void setWeight(Real weight);
00068         void addTime(Real offset);
00069 
00071         bool getEnabled(void) const;
00073         void setEnabled(bool enabled);
00074 
00076         bool operator==(const AnimationState& rhs) const;
00077         // Inequality operator
00078         bool operator!=(const AnimationState& rhs) const;
00079 
00081         Real getValue(void);
00082 
00084         void setValue(Real value);
00085 
00086      
00087     protected:
00088         String mAnimationName;
00089         Real mTimePos;
00090         Real mLength;
00091         Real mInvLength;
00092         Real mWeight;
00093         bool mEnabled;
00094 
00095     };
00096 
00097     // A set of animation states
00098     typedef std::map<String, AnimationState> AnimationStateSet;
